keys: transmisión de la línea de mira

          <title>
            <string language="en">Space-wave propagation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Platz-bewegen Sie Ausbreitung wellenartig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Espace-ondulez la propagation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espaço-acene a propagação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spazio-fluttui la propagazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάδοση διαστημικός-κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espacio-agite la propagación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows straight-line propagation of waves in the ionosphere. This is called space-wave of line-of-sight transmission.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionosphere</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">straight-line propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt lineare Ausbreitung der 
Wellen im ionosphere. Dieses wird Platz-wellenartig bewegen von 
der Line-of-sightübertragung benannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la propagation à ligne 
directe des vagues dans l'ionosphère. Ceci s'appelle 
espace-ondulent de la transmission de line-of-sight.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a propagação em linha 
reta das ondas no ionosphere. Isto é chamado espaço-acena da 
transmissão do line-of-sight.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la propagazione 
straight-line delle onde nello ionosphere. Ciò è chiamata 
spazio-fluttua della trasmissione di line-of-sight.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει straight-line διάδοση 
των κυμάτων στην ιονόσφαιρα. Αυτό καλείται 
διαστημικός-κύμα της μετάδοσης οπτικής επαφής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la propagación 
straight-line de ondas en el ionosphere. Se llama esto 
espacio-agita de la transmisión de la línea de mira.</string>
          </description>
